The Quranic researcher turned into his family, that is: his believers, who are insured, in his case, saying: Hawa, read his writers and it was said: That is: the juris of the believer, who is the one who is the one عَشِيرَتَهُ; For all the believers are the family of the believer from the destination of the consent in faith, and it was said: That is: to his own and whoever is prepared by God Almighty in Paradise from the Population and the Gallery, and the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one Mujahid.Zaid bin Ali read: “And the hearts” of a heart; Building the effective.
